segments.text: Ugh, the sink is overflowing with dirty water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's splashing everywhere, soaking the apron and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just polishing that plate, ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddleâ€”gross, she'll slip for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's balancing on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies like it's nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's begging for one, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stealing snacks, what a bad example.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a neat garden, so clean compared to this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just filthy and chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching the water damage spread.
segments.speaker: PAR
